titlestmt.titleproper: Sabbath School Association of Delaware, Ohio records 1853-1861
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Sabbath School Association of Delaware, Ohio records

bioghist.p: The object of the Sabbath School Association of Delaware, Ohio "was to improve the intellectual and moral characters of the rising generation in their midst and to secure as far as possible the regular attendance of all the children and youth at some one of the different Sabbath schools in Delaware, Ohio."

scopecontent.p: This is a volume of minutes of monthly meetings of the Sabbath School Association of Delaware, Ohio, 1853-1861. The minutes record the reading of reports, election of officers, and results of visitations to Sabbath schools throughout the town. The volume also includes the Association's constitution and bylaws from 1853, a docket, and a list of members.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
